answers.answer: Hi :) Im due march 4th but my dr does csections at 37 weeks so I'll be having her on valentines day or right around then. It's my 4th baby I have 3 boys and this is finally our girl <3 I actually thought having her on valentines was cute lol idk to me its super girlie and I can just imagine daddy bringing her roses and me taking her bday cupcakes etc

Hi :) congrats on finally getting a princess :) I think its cute too but once she's older I feel like she will be shorted on two special days because they will be put together since her bday is so close to Valentines day.. I don't know maybe it be such a big deal to her lol
Maybe it won't be such a big deal to her *** stupid phone lol

my bday is on new years eve lol it was always fun bcuz we were sure to be all together and it always was a big deal then when I got older of course it was awesome for going out lol. As long as u make it a big deal and let her know its her day I think itll be fine :) she can and will definitely get on her bfs case if it bothers her im sure lol
Haha I guess your right. . We shall see lol I will be sure to send her flowers on Valentine's day and balloons on her bday to her school (once shes here and in school) lol
lol that's exactly what I pictured when I thought of having her on valentines aww lol well at least we'll be preparing and healing together lol

That's true lol .. as long as I don't get preeclampsia again she will be here the 16th but with my luck she will probably be here sooner due to my b.p ... I hope she doesn't have to come before 36 weeks.. I had it terrible with my son but I quit going to the Dr at 35 weeks and evidently between those five weeks left I got it so bad to the point when I got to the hospital I almost died becasue it was so high..emergency csection and thank god it went good .. I'm not scared to get another .. can't wait to have her so I can recover and get my exercise on lol

Omg well u better be careful that's scary! Im on my 4th csection I had to have one with my oldest I was 9 centimeters for 36 hrs he just wouldn't drop :/ I didn't mind any of mine they seemed to get even easier after the first I heal super quick

Yeah there monitoring me closely this time lol I get a  u.s every four weeks and at them Appts they check my b.p every time.. so far its perfect and I hope it stays that way ! I was up walking around after I could feel my legs which took about two hours after the surgery .. I healed very fast and so glad I did .. I never had to take medicine or anything so I'm hoping this goes the same way :) glad yours go good too .. I hate hearing horror stories about them lol
Thats good :) hope it stays perfect for u yeah that's exactly how I was I went back to work when my first was 5 days old lol but it seems like my 2nd n 3rd were way better even
Dang five days and back to work lol that's awesome ! I'm hoping to be back to work soon after also !
Lol my mom called me crazy

question: So our time is coming ... Seems like its flying by and I love that but I have a ? For the moms to be that are due around Valentine's day with girls.. so my bday is 2/24 and my bf has tried to celebrate my bday and valentines day together before and its TEN days apart.. well I'm due 2/22 with a girl and I am having a csection so she will be here most likely the 16th.. I'm upset though because I feel as if once she gets older and gets a bf that he will try to celebrate them together and its unfair to her.. it takes away from her having two special days lol my bf tells me its not important but he's a guy so he doesn't get it ... Anyone else thought about this or am I over thinking it like my bf says...
title: all February moms... have a ? for you..
